thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Rodrigo Abad Ruiz
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Rodrigo Abad Ruiz

author: Rodrigo Abad Ruiz
title: Rodrigo Abad Ruiz
text:
I got my sapphire a week ago and I've been taking the nice little glass top box everywhere. Im an asperger young man and there's something about sapphires that just makes me calm. I havent got time to go see my local jewelry but I'll put it on a ring asap.
Like lots here I was extremely pleased to purchase at TNSC. Erika assisted me from the beginning, she sent me pictures of the stones I requested and it all happened so easily.
I've wanted a sapphire since I was very young and finally got a pretty beautiful one. Its small but georgeous lil cushion.
Totally recomend this site.
